install.name: Content - Comments
install.author: JXtended
install.description: Plugin to integrate JXtended Comments into Joomla! articles.

param.name: categories
param.label: Show for Categories
param.description: Choose which categories for which comments will display.

param.name: show_on_frontpage
param.label: Show for Frontpage
param.description: Show comments for articles in a frontpage view that are in categories where comments are enabled.

param.name: show_on_sections
param.label: Show for Sections
param.description: Show comments for articles in a frontpage view that are in categories where comments are enabled.

param.name: share_placement
param.label: Sharing Placement
param.description: Where in an article's display to show sharing.

param.name: ratings_placement
param.label: Ratings Placement
param.description: Where in an article's display to show ratings.

param.name: comments_placement
param.label: Comments Placement
param.description: Where in an article's display to show comments.
